  39. ‌static ngx_command_t  ngx_http_copy_filter_commands[] = {

  41.     { ngx_string("output_buffers"),
  42.       NGX_HTTP_MAIN_CONF|NGX_HTTP_SRV_CONF|NGX_HTTP_LOC_CONF|NGX_CONF_TAKE2,
  43.       ngx_conf_set_bufs_slot,
  44.       NGX_HTTP_LOC_CONF_OFFSET,
  45.       offsetof(ngx_http_copy_filter_conf_t, bufs),
  46.       NULL },

  48.       ngx_null_command

  52. ‌static ngx_http_module_t  ngx_http_copy_filter_module_ctx = {
  53.     NULL,                                  /* preconfiguration */
  54.     ngx_http_copy_filter_init,             /* postconfiguration */

  56.     NULL,                                  /* create main configuration */
  57.     NULL,                                  /* init main configuration */

  59.     NULL,                                  /* create server configuration */
  60.     NULL,                                  /* merge server configuration */

  62.     ngx_http_copy_filter_create_conf,      /* create location configuration */
  63.     ngx_http_copy_filter_merge_conf        /* merge location configuration */
  64. };


  67. ‌ngx_module_t  ngx_http_copy_filter_module = {
  68.     NGX_MODULE_V1,
  69.     &ngx_http_copy_filter_module_ctx,      /* module context */
  70.     ngx_http_copy_filter_commands,         /* module directives */
  71.     NGX_HTTP_MODULE,                       /* module type */
  72.     NULL,                                  /* init master */
  73.     NULL,                                  /* init module */
  74.     NULL,                                  /* init process */
  75.     NULL,                                  /* init thread */
  76.     NULL,                                  /* exit thread */
  77.     NULL,                                  /* exit process */
  78.     NULL,                                  /* exit master */
  79.     NGX_MODULE_V1_PADDING
  80. };


  83. ‌static ngx_http_output_body_filter_pt    ngx_http_next_body_filter;


  86. static ngx_int_t
  87. ‌ngx_http_copy_filter(ngx_http_request_t *r, ngx_chain_t *in)
  88. {
  89.     ngx_int_t                     rc;
  90.     ngx_connection_t             *c;
  91.     ngx_output_chain_ctx_t       *ctx;
  92.     ngx_http_core_loc_conf_t     *clcf;
  93.     ngx_http_copy_filter_conf_t  *conf;

  95.     c = r->connection;

  97.     ngx_log_debug2(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_HTTP, c->log, 0,
  98.                    "http copy filter: \"%V?%V\"", &r->uri, &r->args);

  100.     ctx = ngx_http_get_module_ctx(r, ngx_http_copy_filter_module);

  102.     if (ctx == NULL) {
  103.         ctx = ngx_pcalloc(r->pool, sizeof(ngx_output_chain_ctx_t));
  104.         if (ctx == NULL) {
  105.             return NGX_ERROR;
  106.         }

  108.         ngx_http_set_ctx(r, ctx, ngx_http_copy_filter_module);

  110.         conf = ngx_http_get_module_loc_conf(r, ngx_http_copy_filter_module);
  111.         clcf = ngx_http_get_module_loc_conf(r, ngx_http_core_module);

  113.         ctx->sendfile = c->sendfile;
  114.         ctx->need_in_memory = r->main_filter_need_in_memory
  115.                               || r->filter_need_in_memory;
  116.         ctx->need_in_temp = r->filter_need_temporary;

  118.         ctx->alignment = clcf->directio_alignment;

  120.         ctx->pool = r->pool;
  121.         ctx->bufs = conf->bufs;
  122.         ctx->tag = (ngx_buf_tag_t) &ngx_http_copy_filter_module;

  124.         ctx->output_filter = (ngx_output_chain_filter_pt)
  125.                                   ngx_http_next_body_filter;
  126.         ctx->filter_ctx = r;

  128. #if (NGX_HAVE_FILE_AIO)
  129.         if (ngx_file_aio && clcf->aio == NGX_HTTP_AIO_ON) {
  130.             ctx->aio_handler = ngx_http_copy_aio_handler;
  131. #if (NGX_HAVE_AIO_SENDFILE)
  132.             ctx->aio_preload = ngx_http_copy_aio_sendfile_preload;
  133. #endif
  134.         }
  135. #endif

  137. #if (NGX_THREADS)
  138.         if (clcf->aio == NGX_HTTP_AIO_THREADS) {
  139.             ctx->thread_handler = ngx_http_copy_thread_handler;
  140.         }
  141. #endif

  143.         if (in && in->buf && ngx_buf_size(in->buf)) {
  144.             r->request_output = 1;
  145.         }
  146.     }

  148. #if (NGX_HAVE_FILE_AIO || NGX_THREADS)
  149.     ctx->aio = r->aio;
  150. #endif

  152.     rc = ngx_output_chain(ctx, in);

  154.     if (ctx->in == NULL) {
  155.         r->buffered &= ~NGX_HTTP_COPY_BUFFERED;

  157.     } else {
  158.         r->buffered |= NGX_HTTP_COPY_BUFFERED;
  159.     }

  161.     ngx_log_debug3(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_HTTP, c->log, 0,
  162.                    "http copy filter: %i \"%V?%V\"", rc, &r->uri, &r->args);

  164.     return rc;
  165. }


  168. #if (NGX_HAVE_FILE_AIO)

  170. static void
  171. ‌ngx_http_copy_aio_handler(ngx_output_chain_ctx_t *ctx, ngx_file_t *file)
  172. {
  173.     ngx_http_request_t *r;

  175.     r = ctx->filter_ctx;

  177.     file->aio->data = r;
  178.     file->aio->handler = ngx_http_copy_aio_event_handler;

  180.     r->main->blocked++;
  181.     r->aio = 1;
  182.     ctx->aio = 1;
  183. }


  186. static void
  187. ‌ngx_http_copy_aio_event_handler(ngx_event_t *ev)
  188. {
  189.     ngx_event_aio_t     *aio;
  190.     ngx_http_request_t  *r;

  192.     aio = ev->data;
  193.     r = aio->data;

  195.     r->main->blocked--;
  196.     r->aio = 0;

  198.     r->connection->write->handler(r->connection->write);
  199. }


  202. #if (NGX_HAVE_AIO_SENDFILE)

  204. static ssize_t
  205. ‌ngx_http_copy_aio_sendfile_preload(ngx_buf_t *file)
  206. {
  207.     ssize_t                  n;
  208.     static u_char            buf[1];
  209.     ngx_event_aio_t         *aio;
  210.     ngx_http_request_t      *r;
  211.     ngx_output_chain_ctx_t  *ctx;

  213.     n = ngx_file_aio_read(file->file, buf, 1, file->file_pos, NULL);

  215.     if (n == NGX_AGAIN) {
  216.         aio = file->file->aio;
  217.         aio->handler = ngx_http_copy_aio_sendfile_event_handler;

  219.         r = aio->data;
  220.         r->main->blocked++;
  221.         r->aio = 1;

  223.         ctx = ngx_http_get_module_ctx(r, ngx_http_copy_filter_module);
  224.         ctx->aio = 1;
  225.     }

  227.     return n;
  228. }


  231. static void
  232. ‌ngx_http_copy_aio_sendfile_event_handler(ngx_event_t *ev)
  233. {
  234.     ngx_event_aio_t     *aio;
  235.     ngx_http_request_t  *r;

  237.     aio = ev->data;
  238.     r = aio->data;

  240.     r->main->blocked--;
  241.     r->aio = 0;
  242.     ev->complete = 0;

  244.     r->connection->write->handler(r->connection->write);
  245. }

  247. #endif
  248. #endif


  251. #if (NGX_THREADS)

  253. static ngx_int_t
  254. ‌ngx_http_copy_thread_handler(ngx_thread_task_t *task, ngx_file_t *file)
  255. {
  256.     ngx_str_t                  name;
  257.     ngx_thread_pool_t         *tp;
  258.     ngx_http_request_t        *r;
  259.     ngx_output_chain_ctx_t    *ctx;
  260.     ngx_http_core_loc_conf_t  *clcf;

  262.     r = file->thread_ctx;

  264.     clcf = ngx_http_get_module_loc_conf(r, ngx_http_core_module);
  265.     tp = clcf->thread_pool;

  267.     if (tp == NULL) {
  268.         if (ngx_http_complex_value(r, clcf->thread_pool_value, &name)
  269.             != NGX_OK)
  270.         {
  271.             return NGX_ERROR;
  272.         }

  274.         tp = ngx_thread_pool_get((ngx_cycle_t *) ngx_cycle, &name);

  276.         if (tp == NULL) {
  277.             ngx_log_error(NGX_LOG_ERR, r->connection->log, 0,
  278.                           "thread pool \"%V\" not found", &name);
  279.             return NGX_ERROR;
  280.         }
  281.     }

  283.     task->event.data = r;
  284.     task->event.handler = ngx_http_copy_thread_event_handler;

  286.     if (ngx_thread_task_post(tp, task) != NGX_OK) {
  287.         return NGX_ERROR;
  288.     }

  290.     r->main->blocked++;
  291.     r->aio = 1;

  293.     ctx = ngx_http_get_module_ctx(r, ngx_http_copy_filter_module);
  294.     ctx->aio = 1;

  296.     return NGX_OK;
  297. }


  300. static void
  301. ‌ngx_http_copy_thread_event_handler(ngx_event_t *ev)
  302. {
  303.     ngx_http_request_t  *r;

  305.     r = ev->data;

  307.     r->main->blocked--;
  308.     r->aio = 0;

  310.     r->connection->write->handler(r->connection->write);
  311. }

  313. #endif


  316. static void *
  317. ‌ngx_http_copy_filter_create_conf(ngx_conf_t *cf)
  318. {
  319.     ngx_http_copy_filter_conf_t *conf;

  321.     conf = ngx_palloc(cf->pool, sizeof(ngx_http_copy_filter_conf_t));
  322.     if (conf == NULL) {
  323.         return NULL;
  324.     }

  326.     conf->bufs.num = 0;

  328.     return conf;
  329. }


  332. static char *
  333. ‌ngx_http_copy_filter_merge_conf(ngx_conf_t *cf, void *parent, void *child)
  334. {
  335.     ngx_http_copy_filter_conf_t *prev = parent;
  336.     ngx_http_copy_filter_conf_t *conf = child;

  338.     ngx_conf_merge_bufs_value(conf->bufs, prev->bufs, 2, 32768);

  340.     return NULL;
  341. }


  344. static ngx_int_t
  345. ‌ngx_http_copy_filter_init(ngx_conf_t *cf)
  346. {
  347.     ngx_http_next_body_filter = ngx_http_top_body_filter;
  348.     ngx_http_top_body_filter = ngx_http_copy_filter;

  350.     return NGX_OK;
  351. }
